Applications

Collaboration diagram for Applications:

Modules

 Desktop application
 

The desktop application handles launching of additional applications.


 Application utilities
 

Application utilities are helper utilities which are useful for the applications.


 Touch screen calibration application
 

This application performs touch screen calibration by utilizing the Touch driver and Workqueue system.


 Calculator application
 

The calculator application demonstrates some of the available widgets in the Widget toolkit.


 Analog and digital clock application
 

This application will display an analog and digital clock on the screen.


 Fonts demonstration application
 

The font application demonstrates use of fonts with the Graphics display system.


 File system contents application
 

The file system contents application demonstrates parts of the Tiny Simple File System. It also demonstrates how to do string formatting using the stream utilities.


 Slideshow application
 

The slideshow application is a timed, automatic image loader. It demonstrates use of the Window toolkit and Tiny Simple file system.


 Water tank application
 

The water tank application is a process control-inspired demonstration of the slider, progress bar and command button widgets in the Widget toolkit; bitmaps of the Graphics display system; and basic use of the Window toolkit.


 Memory game application
 

The memory game application is a simple game where the user has to find pairs of game pieces, i.e., ones that have the same image. It demonstrates usage of the button and label widgets in the Widget toolkit, drawing text with the Graphical display system and basic use of the Window System.


 Widget demo application
 

This application demonstrates most of the available widgets in the Widget toolkit.
